generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, on which cars are driving and parked.
- sidewalk: The sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, with a curb separating it from the road, and it has pedestrians and parked cars adjacent to it.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, featuring various architectural styles and commercial signage.
- vegetation: A tree is visible in the middle distance, positioned between the buildings on the street.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and tree, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along both sides of the street and some are driving in the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the left side of the image, hanging from a pole above the street.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the image, mounted on a pole above the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs, and utility poles along the street.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
